column4: hi guys, can someone please help? keep in mind that im a fresh linux user here... i would like to install kvirc 3, ive tried searvhing in synaptic and get version 2 as the ltest.apt-get tells me that i have the latest installed. but on the website i downloaded "kvirc-3.2.0.tar.bz2" and i would like to install it, can anyone tell me how i go about doing it please?
tar jxvf kvirc-3.2.0.tar.bz2 and read the readme
not when a release is stable
